attributes.additional_details:
Crossrail is not a tube line, it is a railway, find out more and other peoples opinions by watching this video and reading the comments:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XaBBg6Cyv9Q
attributes.background: We all know that crossrail was planned many years ago, and is finally under construction, however, why call it the Elizabeth line? Now rebranding will have to take place, considering that the stations already have signs reading crossrail which are ready to be peeled off when the service arrives.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
